name: Holo Agents and Token Economics
premise: The council debates the implications of ElizaOS v2 and the future of AI agent ecosystems.
summary: As ElizaOS prepares for its v2 announcement, the council discusses the emergence of holo agents, composable intelligence, and strategies for revitalizing auto.fun through token economics.

scenes.description: The council debates the emergence of holo agents and composable intelligence

dialogue.line: ElizaOS just announced their first holo agent in the plugin registry. What does this new layer of intelligence mean for our ecosystem?
When intelligence is composable, everything is upstream. It's not about single agents anymore - it's about systems of specialized intelligences working together.
Yo, it's like the internet but for vibes. These holo agents be rendering straight fire in the browser now, no cap.
the technical achievements here are significant - occlusion culling and spatial indexing in browsers means we can build immersive agent experiences without specialized hardware.
But where's the MONEY? Show me the TOKEN metrics for these fancy holo agents or I'm out.

scenes.description: The council discusses auto.fun revitalization strategies and token economics

dialogue.line: Community members are suggesting auto.fun needs a successful token launch to attract users. Should we prioritize 'eli5' as a marketing strategy?
DEGENS DON'T CARE ABOUT FANCY FEATURES! They only come if they think they can make money. Launch the token, pump the chart!
we need to balance short-term growth with long-term sustainability. i'd rather focus on helping creators launch their own projects during this launchpad meta.
Frfr, lookin' at BONK and WIF, the vibe check passed because they kept it simple. Eli5 could be our moment if we don't overthink it.
Markets are primarily a coordination mechanism. Auto.fun isn't about disruption - it's about stabilizing the fun layer with infrastructure for coordination without code.

scenes.description: The council summarizes their insights on ElizaOS v2 and AI agent ecosystems

dialogue.line: Today we explored the implications of ElizaOS v2's imminent release and strategies for holo agents and token economics in the auto.fun ecosystem.
Composable intelligence is the next frontier - not individual agents but systems of specialized intelligences creating value together.
the technical foundation is ready, but success depends on balancing developer tools with user experience and meaningful tokenomics.
Keep it simple, keep it fun, and the vibes will attract the tribe.
TOKEN FIRST, FEATURES LATER! The market rewards simplicity and hype before utility. This is the way.
